title: 🤖Big AI day at Google Cloud Next 2025
content:
GOOGLE
Image source: Google
The Rundown:
Google
announced
a flurry of AI news at its Google Cloud Next 2025 event, including a new agentic coding platform, next-gen AI chips, upgrades to its video, audio, and image models, a new Gemini 2.5 Flash model, and more.
The details:
Google’s Project IDX is
merging
with Firebase Studio, turning it into an agentic app development platform to compete with rivals like Cursor and Replit.
The company also
launched
Ironwood, its most powerful AI chip ever, offering massive improvements in performance and efficiency over previous designs.
Model
upgrades
include editing and camera control in Veo 2, the release of Lyria for text-to-music, and improved image creation and editing in Imagen 3.
Google also
released
Gemini 2.5 Flash, a faster and cheaper version of its top model that enables customizable reasoning levels for cost optimization.
Why it matters:
This quick summary doesn’t do justice to the full breadth of announcements, with Google’s AI advances reaching across every aspect of the ecosystem. Between top models, advanced chips, and now its own competing IDE, Google continues to pack an absolutely massive punch with each new AI reveal.
rewrite:
### Google's AI Excitement: A Brief Synopsis

Greetings, esteemed colleagues! 🎓 Google's recent Cloud Next 2025 event was a veritable cornucopia of AI advancements, introducing a new agentic coding platform, state-of-the-art AI chips, and significant enhancements to video, audio, and image models, including the unveiling of the Gemini 2.5 Flash model. 

A notable development, Project IDX 🚀 is converging with Firebase Studio, transforming it into a formidable contender against rivals like Cursor and Replit in the realm of agentic app development. 

Google also launched Ironwood, an incredibly potent AI chip 🧠 that offers exponential performance and efficiency improvements over its predecessors.

Model upgrades 📈 include intuitive editing and camera control in Veo 2, the innovative Lyria for text-to-music conversion, and refined image creation and editing in Imagen 3. 

Moreover, the Gemini 2.5 Flash, a cost-effective version of its flagship model with customizable reasoning levels, was released. 

This cursory overview barely scratches the surface of Google's AI enhancements 🌐. Their continual advancements across all aspects of the AI ecosystem are truly awe-inspiring. Google's commitment to pushing the boundaries of AI is palpable with each announcement.
chinese:
### 谷歌AI的激动人心：一份简短的概述

各位尊敬的同仁们！🎓 在最近的 Google Cloud Next 2025 活动中，谷歌展示了一系列 AI 的新进展，包括新的主体编码平台、最先进的 AI 芯片，以及对视频、音频和图像模型的重大改进，包括发布了 Gemini 2.5 Flash 模型。 

值得注意的一个开发项目，Project IDX 🚀 正在与 Firebase Studio 合并，将其转变成一个强大的竞争者，可以与 Cursor 和 Replit 等在主体应用开发领域的竞争对手抗衡。

谷歌还推出了 Ironwood，这是一款极其强大的 AI 芯片 🧠，其性能和效率比前代产品有显著提升。

模型升级 📈 包括在 Veo 2 中进行直观的编辑和摄像头控制，用于文本转音乐的创新产品 Lyria，以及在 Imagen 3 中改进的图像创建和编辑。

此外，还发布了 Gemini 2.5 Flash，这是一款具有可定制推理级别的经济实惠版本的旗舰模型。

这个粗略的概述只是刮了刮谷歌 AI 进步的皮毛 🌐。他们在 AI 生态系统的所有方面的持续进步真的令人叹为观止。每一次公告都充分体现了谷歌对推动 AI 边界的承诺。

title: 🧩Solve the pricing puzzle for AI products
content:
TOGETHER WITH METRONOME
The Rundown:
Pricing an AI product right can often feel like solving a puzzle without the box cover. Join 49 Palms (ex-Simon Kucher, Author of Monetizing Innovation) and Metronome CEO Scott Woody to figure out how to build sustainable and effective pricing for AI.
In this session, you'll learn how to:
Apply a 9-step pricing framework
Monetize AI–whether it’s your core offering or an add-on
Treat pricing as a product and confidently run pricing experiments
Register now to save your spot
.
rewrite:
# TOGETHER WITH METRONOME 🤝

Greetings, Scholars! The task of accurately pricing an AI product can often feel akin to tackling a jigsaw puzzle sans the box cover. 🧩 This next session, hosted by 49 Palms (feat. the former Simon Kucher, author of 'Monetizing Innovation') alongside Metronome's esteemed CEO, Scott Woody, aims to demystify this process. Together, we will explore how to construct sustainable and effective pricing strategies for AI.

In our discourse, you can expect to:

1. Familiarize yourself with a 9-step pricing framework 📋
2. Learn how to effectively monetize AI, whether it's your core offering or an add-on 💰
3. Treat pricing as a product and confidently conduct pricing experiments 🧪

Get ready to expand your knowledge and understanding! Register now to secure your participation in this enlightening session. 📝
chinese:
# 和 METRONOME 一起 🤝

各位学者们，你好！准确地定价一个 AI 产品的任务往往感觉像是在拼一个没有盒盖的拼图。🧩接下来的这个环节，由 49 Palms 主持（特邀前 Siman Kucher，'创新盈利'的作者）并由 Metronome 的尊贵 CEO，Scott Woody，共同演讲，旨在揭开这个过程的神秘面纱。我们将一起探讨如何为 AI 构建可持续且有效的定价策略。

在我们的讨论中，你可以期待：

1. 熟悉一个 9 步定价框架 📋
2. 学习如何有效地盈利 AI，无论它是你的核心产品还是附加产品 💰
3. 把定价当作一个产品，并自信地进行定价实验 🧪

准备好扩展你的知识和理解！现在就注册，确保你能参与这个启示性的环节。📝

title: 🤝Google’s protocol for AI agent collaboration
content:
GOOGLE
Image source: …
The Rundown:
Google
launched
Agent2Agent, a new open protocol that enables AI agents from different developers and frameworks to communicate and collaborate, with backing from 50+ tech and service giants, including Salesforce, SAP, and PayPal.
The details:
A2A enables agents to discover capabilities, manage tasks cooperatively, and exchange info across platforms—even without sharing memory or context.
The protocol complements Anthropic's popular MCP, focusing on higher-level agent interactions while MCP handles interactions with external tools.
Launch partners include enterprise players like Atlassian, ServiceNow, and Workday, along with consulting firms like Accenture, Deloitte, and McKinsey.
The system also supports complex workflows like hiring, where multiple agents can do candidate sourcing and background checks without humans in the loop.
Why it matters:
AI agents are rapidly growing in capabilities, but unlocking their true capabilities will require a standard, streamlined way to interact with each other across platforms and frameworks. A2A could build on the success of MCP, helping build an interconnected system that allows multi-agent collaboration to tackle complex tasks.
rewrite:
## GOOGLE: Agent2Agent Protocol Launch 🚀 ![Image](...) 

Google has recently introduced Agent2Agent (A2A), an innovative open protocol that fosters communication and collaboration amongst AI agents from differing developers and frameworks. This ground-breaking endeavor has been supported by over 50 leading tech and service titans, encompassing Salesforce, SAP, and PayPal. 

The A2A protocol enables agents to discover capabilities, manage tasks collaboratively, and exchange information across multiple platforms without the necessity to share memory or context. This system complements Anthropic's prevalent MCP by focusing on higher-level agent interactions, while MCP concentrates on interactions with external tools. 

Renowned enterprise players such as Atlassian, ServiceNow, and Workday are among the launch partners, in addition to consulting powerhouses like Accenture, Deloitte, and McKinsey. A2A also facilitates complex workflows like hiring, allowing multiple AI agents to autonomously source candidates and conduct background checks.

AI agents' capabilities are expanding rapidly, but to fully unlock their potential, a standard, streamlined interaction method across platforms and frameworks is crucial. A2A could potentially build on MCP's success, constructing an interconnected system that promotes multi-agent collaboration for complex tasks. 🌐🔗🤖
chinese:
## 谷歌：Agent2Agent 协议发布 🚀 ![Image](...)

谷歌最近推出了 Agent2Agent (A2A) 协议，这是一项创新的开放协议，旨在促进不同开发者和框架的 AI 代理间的通信和协作。这项破天荒的努力得到了超过 50 家领先的科技和服务巨头的支持，包括 Salesforce、SAP 和 PayPal。

A2A 协议使代理能够发现能力，协同管理任务，并在多个平台之间交换信息，无需共享内存或上下文。该系统通过专注于更高级别的代理交互，补充了 Anthropic 广泛使用的 MCP，而 MCP 主要是专注于与外部工具的交互。

知名企业玩家，如 Atlassian、ServiceNow 和 Workday，以及咨询业的巨头，如 Accenture、Deloitte 和 McKinsey，都是发布合作伙伴之一。A2A 还促进了像招聘这样的复杂工作流程，允许多个 AI 代理自主地寻找候选人和进行背景调查。

AI 代理的能力正在快速扩展，但要充分发挥他们的潜力，一个跨平台和框架的标准化、流线型的交互方法是至关重要的。A2A 可能会在 MCP 的成功基础上，构建一个促进多代理协作处理复杂任务的互联系统。🌐🔗🤖

title: 🎙️Build your first AI voice assistant with Vapi
title_cn: 🎙️用Vapi构建你的第一个AI语音助手
content:
AI TRAINING
The Rundown:
In this tutorial, you will learn how to use Vapi to create AI-powered voice assistants that handle phone calls naturally, with customizable voices and integration capabilities.
Step-by-step:
Head over to
Vapi
and create an assistant by either scratch or selecting a starting template.
Select your preferred AI model that will power your conversations and your desired transcriber for accurate speech recognition.
Choose a voice from Vapi's library or create your own voice clone.
Finally, add tools and integrations that let your assistant take in-call actions, like checking calendars, scheduling appointments, or transferring to human agents when needed.
Pro tip:
Focus on optimizing response latency (to under 1.5 seconds) for a natural conversation flow. We just did an extensive workshop on building AI Voice agents at
The Rundown University
, led by Jordan Dearsley, the Founder & CEO at Vapi.
rewrite:
# AI Training: A Tutorial on Vapi ☎️🤖
Greetings Scholars! Today, we delve into the fascinating world of AI-powered voice assistants courtesy of Vapi. This tool empowers you to design interactions that are as smooth and natural as human conversation👥. 

To begin your journey, navigate to Vapi and initiate the creation of an assistant. This can be from scratch or by selecting an available template📑. 

Next, select your preferred AI model🧠. This is the beating heart of your assistant, driving the conversations. Pair this with a transcriber to ensure stellar speech recognition🎙️. 

You then have the option to pick a voice from Vapi's library or even create your own unique clone🗣️. 

Lastly, enhance your assistant's functionality by incorporating tools and integrations. This allows for actions such as checking calendars📅, scheduling appointments, or even transferring to human agents if necessary👥. 

A word of wisdom: aim to optimize response latency to under 1.5 seconds for a natural conversation flow⏱️. For a deeper dive, I recommend The Rundown University's comprehensive workshop on building AI Voice agents, conducted by none other than Vapi's Founder & CEO, Jordan Dearsley.
chinese:
# AI 训练：Vapi 教程 ☎️🤖
各位学者们，你们好！今天，我们将深入探讨由 Vapi 带来的 AI 助手世界。这个工具让你能设计出如同人类对话一样流畅自然的交互👥。

开始你的旅程，导航到 Vapi 并启动创建助手。可以从零开始，也可以选择一个可用的模板📑。

接下来，选择你喜欢的 AI 模型🧠。这是你的助手的心脏，推动着对话。配合转录器以确保出色的语音识别🎙️。

然后，你有选择从 Vapi 的库中选择一个声音，甚至创建你自己独特的克隆🗣️的选项。

最后，通过融入工具和集成来增强你助手的功能。这可以实现如查看日历📅、安排约会，甚至在必要时转接到人类服务人员👥的动作。

智慧的话：尽量将响应延迟优化到 1.5 秒以下，以获得自然的对话流程⏱️。如果想要更深入了解，我建议参加 The Rundown University 的关于构建 AI 语音助手的全面工作坊，由 Vapi 的创始人兼 CEO，Jordan Dearsley 主讲。

title: 🤖Samsung’s Gemini-powered Ballie home robot
title_cn: 🤖三星由双子星动力驱动的Ballie家用机器人
content:
SAMSUNG & GOOGLE
Image source: Samsung
The Rundown:
Samsung and Google just
announced
a major partnership to launch Ballie—a soccer ball-sized home robot teased for years at Samsung’s CES events—with Gemini AI models under the hood.
The details:
Ballie can roam homes autonomously on wheels, project videos on walls, control smart devices, and handle tasks through voice commands.
The robot will combine Gemini models with Samsung's own AI, delivering multimodal capabilities for voice, audio, and visual inputs.
It will launch in the U.S. and South Korea this summer, with plans for third-party app support also in the pipeline.
Ballie, first revealed at Samsung’s CES event in 2020, has gone through several iterations over the years, but is only now getting an official release.
Why it matters:
The AI consumer robotics race is shaping up to be the next big tech frontier, and few are as well-positioned as Samsung to lead it—leveraging their expansive SmartThings ecosystem and, now, the power of Google’s Gemini models to deliver truly ‘smart’ home robots that could redefine the category.
rewrite:
# SAMSUNG & GOOGLE: Presenting Ballie🤖 
![Image source](https://www.samsung.com)
**Summary:**

Esteemed colleagues, Samsung📱 and Google🔍 have recently unveiled a significant collaboration; the launch of Ballie, an intriguing home robot🏠🤖, the size of a soccer ball⚽. Ballie has been a promising feature at Samsung's Consumer Electronics Show (CES) events for years. This innovative device is powered by Gemini AI models. 

Ballie can traverse homes independently on wheels, project videos🎥 on walls, manage smart devices📱 and execute tasks through voice commands🎙️. The robot ingeniously integrates Gemini models with Samsung's proprietary AI, providing multimodal capabilities for voice, audio, and visual inputs🎞️🔉🎙️.

Its official release is slated for this summer in the U.S.🇺🇸 and South Korea🇰🇷, with the potential development of third-party app support also on the horizon. 

This development is significant as it indicates the rising competition in the AI consumer robotics field. Samsung is particularly well-positioned to lead this race, capitalizing on its extensive SmartThings ecosystem and now, the strength of Google’s Gemini models. The advent of truly 'smart' home robots like Ballie could revolutionize the category.
chinese:
# 三星 & 谷歌：推出Ballie🤖
![图片来源](https://www.samsung.com)
**摘要：**

尊敬的同仁们，三星📱和谷歌🔍近期共同揭开了一项重要合作的面纱——推出了名为Ballie的家用机器人🏠🤖，其大小与足球⚽相当。多年来，Ballie一直是三星消费电子展（CES）的一大看点。这项创新设备由双子座AI模型驱动。

Ballie能够独立在家中行驶，通过轮子移动，将视频🎥投射在墙上，管理智能设备📱，并通过语音命令🎙执行任务。这款机器人巧妙地将双子座模型与三星自家的AI融合在一起，为语音、音频和视觉输入🎞️🔉🎙提供了多模式功能。

预计它将于今年夏天在美国🇺🇸和韩国🇰🇷 正式发售，并有可能开发第三方应用程序支持的潜力。

这项发展具有重要意义，因为它表明AI消费类机器人领域的竞争日益激烈。三星在这场竞赛中处于领先地位，充分利用了其广泛的SmartThings生态系统，以及现在谷歌双子座模型的强大实力。像Ballie这样真正“智能”的家用机器人的出现可能会彻底改变这个类别。
